name: Unblock Block To Let Me Out Puzzle
name_original: Unblock Block To Let Me Out Puzzle
description:
An addictive brain puzzle game.

The goal of the game is to get the red golden block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way. Just like escaped from the rush hour.

Key Features:
- 4 difficult levels ranging from Easy, Medium, Hard, to Expert
- 2000+ puzzles in total for you to enjoy
- Ranking system to keep you more challenged
- Keep track of all the puzzles you've cleared
- Hint system that will guide you through the puzzle
- Undo system
- Hours of enjoy for FREE!
